question: 性格
sourceMnemonic: Your <kanji>gender</kanji> and <kanji>status</kanji> are part of your <vocabulary>personality</vocabulary>. Think about what gender you identify as, and what your current status is (in relationships, residency, employment...). Now think about how all that affects your <vocabulary>personality</vocabulary>!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
